item.description:
Meet at the center bleachers this Saturday at Conard at 9 am.

In addition, Eric's Single Event group is playing on ........

This Saturday ~ August 30th ~ 10:00 AM
Wapping Elementary School ~ South Windsor
91 Ayers Road ~ South Windsor, CT ~ 06074

and

This Sunday ~ August 31st ~ 9:00 AM
Conard High School

See you at Conard on Saturday.

Call me at 860-559-7983 with questions or comments. Thanks.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
